CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: J sc derived from the EQE spectra were estimated to be 14.12 , 14.92 , 16.29 , and 14.21 mA cm^-2 for PffBB-10 , PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 - based devices , respectively , which were in good agreement with those obtained from J-V characterization ( Figure 6 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. PffBB-10, PffBB-12, PffBB-14, and PffBB-16 - These are the names of the materials or devices mentioned in the paragraph. Therefore, the Material Name entities are PffBB-10, PffBB-12, PffBB-14, and PffBB-16.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

The Material Name entities in the paragraph are:

1. PffBB-10
2. PffBB-12
3. PffBB-14
4. PffBB-16

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-10 |
| PffBB-12 |
| PffBB-14 |
| PffBB-16 |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: J sc derived from the EQE spectra were estimated to be 14.12 , 14.92 , 16.29 , and 14.21 mA cm^-2 for PffBB-10 , PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 - based devices , respectively , which were in good agreement with those obtained from J-V characterization ( Figure 6 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. J: This is a current density property.
2. sc: This is a shorthand term for short-circuit current density.
3. PffBB-10, PffBB-12, PffBB-14, PffBB-16: These are the names of the devices.
4. mA: This is a unit of current.
5. cm^-2: This is a unit of area density.

So, the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. J (current density)
2. sc (short-circuit current density)
3. mA (ampere)
4. cm^-2 (square centimeter)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

The entities that clearly refer to material properties in the paragraph are:

1. J (current density)
2. sc (short-circuit current density)

The other entities are units or device names and do not directly refer to material properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| current density (J) |
| short-circuit current density (sc) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: J sc derived from the EQE spectra were estimated to be 14.12 , 14.92 , 16.29 , and 14.21 mA cm^-2 for PffBB-10 , PffBB-12 , PffBB-14 , and PffBB-16 - based devices , respectively , which were in good agreement with those obtained from J-V characterization ( Figure 6 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. PffBB-10, PffBB-12, PffBB-14, and PffBB-16 - These are the names of the based devices.
2. 14.12, 14.92, 16.29, and 14.21 mA cm^-2 - These are the estimated property values for the current density (J) of PffBB-10, PffBB-12, PffBB-14, and PffBB-16 based devices respectively.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. 14.12 mA cm^-2 (for PffBB-10)
2. 14.92 mA cm^-2 (for PffBB-12)
3. 16.29 mA cm^-2 (for PffBB-14)
4. 14.21 mA cm^-2 (for PffBB-16)

These are the entities that clearly refer to the values of material properties (current density in this case).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 14.12 mA cm^-2 (for PffBB-10) |
| 14.92 mA cm^-2 (for PffBB-12) |
| 16.29 mA cm^-2 (for PffBB-14) |
| 14.21 mA cm^-2 (for PffBB-16) |
